name: Devilish Pong
description:
Updated version 1.2.0 - added portals! and more dialog to the devil upon reaching +50,000 souls.

Game made in two weeks. Tried to answer the question, what happens to the hero when we don't press the continue option? also wanted some real never ending game that when you "lose" you are transported back to the start of the game at real time, not with a fade screen.

Practice for story telling and particle systems.

I discovered I really enjoy doing 2D art :)

Instructions:

- Move with arrows key or WASD

Don't forget to have fun!

For this project I used CC0 Public Domain music & soundeffects:

-Boogey999 - "Fantasy" https://opengameart.org/content/fantasy-0

-Joth - "Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata" https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata

-artisticdude "Covert Operations" https://opengameart.org/content/covert-operations

-Alex McCulloch a.k.a Amac1990  - "(Rock) Sword of Mystery" https://opengameart.org/content/rocksword-of-mystery

-mrdirectx - "EvilSatanLaugh" https://freesound.org/people/mrdirectx/sounds/182874/
